author: ogel3001
title: NBA Jam Session Co-Pack.
review:
Use the figs to pick up the basketballs, pull them back (they have spring-loaded legs) and try to fling the basketballs through the spinning hoops. If you miss the balls go flying everywhere. 

Pros

  • Red and blue basketballs.
  • Wind up base.
  • Real basketball.
  • This set is a challenge, unlike 3427 NBA Slam Dunk.

Cons

  • The baskets fill up quickly.
  • The baskets don't spin around very long.
  • The balls get lost a lot.

This set is rare and if you see it I would recommend you get it.
